titleStmt.title: Crowdsourced-Data Normalization with Python and Pandas
titleStmt.author: Halle Burns

sourceDesc.p: Born digital, in a markdown format. This lesson is original.

abstract.p: Pandas is a popular and powerful package used in Python communities for data handling and analysis. This lesson describes crowdsourcing as a form of data creation as well as how pandas can be used to prepare a crowdsourced dataset for analysis. This lesson covers managing duplicate and missing data and explains the difficulties of dealing with dates.

s.code: pd.to_datetime(dropped_na['date'], errors ='coerce', dayfirst = False, yearfirst = False)
